The /comment command is the text of your: The /comment command is the text of your comment, entered separated by a space after /comment
For example: /comment Hi, everything is: For example: /comment Hi, everything is working great
The /study command is a string of Englis: The /study command is a string of English words you want to study, separated by spaces
